election_record.label: Virginia 1801 Speaker of the House

overview.note: "On Monday the General Assembly of Virginia convened. A quorum of the House of Delegates having qualified and taken their seats...Mr. Larkin Smith was then unanimously chosen Speaker." American. And Baltimore Daily Advertiser (Baltimore, MD). December 14, 1801.
